Summary: Bright orange ball of fire flickering, moving from east to west stopping and starting.
divs: Sighting DetailsBright orange flicking fire ball hovering in the western sky, stalling, then became dim then brighter, stalls for a minute ot two then traveling east and then going up and out of sight. 12 people witnessed, very erie, nobody discussd after the episode, until today Sunday..
